summary: THE CONSUMER WAS TOLD BY DAIMLER CHRYSLER THAT THE GOVERNMENT DOES NOT WANT TO DO A RECALL ON THE SEAT BELTS.  HE ALSO INDICATED THAT THERE WERE OTHER CONSUMER GROUPS/MAGAZINES THAT LIST COMPLAINTS ON THE SEAT BELTS.  THE RELEASE BUTTON PROTRUDES AND WILL UNLATCH AT THE SLIGHTEST MOVEMENT.  *NLM
